import { Component, Input, OnInit, OnChanges, SimpleChanges } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { NavigationItem, SideNavItem } from '../navigation'; @Component({ selector: 'app-side-nav', templateUrl: './side-nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./side-nav.component.css'] }) export class SideNavComponent implements OnInit, OnChanges { @Input() navData: NavigationItem; constructor(){ } ngOnInit(): void { } ngOnChanges(changes: SimpleChanges){ console.log('object', this.navData) } navigateToLink(route: string){ } }
